shortdesc.ph: Sets the camera manual focus position.

p.codeblock: public abstract int setCameraFocusPositionInPreview(float positionX, float positionY);
virtual int setCameraFocusPositionInPreview(float positionX, float positionY) = 0;
public abstract int SetCameraFocusPositionInPreview(float positionX, float positionY);
Future<void> setCameraFocusPositionInPreview( {required double positionX, required double positionY});

section.title: Details
section.p: This method needs to be called after the camera is started (for example, by calling or ). After a successful method call, the SDK triggers the callback.
section.note: This method is for Android and iOS only.

plentry.pd: The horizontal coordinate of the touchpoint in the view.
The vertical coordinate of the touchpoint in the view.
The coordinate of the touchpoint in the view.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown; you need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.
